caption.p: Influence of small changes in ROI of the images analyzed on the results obtained and their relationship. ( aâ€“c) Dependence of entropy on fractal dimension for the nCoV particles of different shape. ( d) Dependence of the fractal dimension on threshold values. The estimates obtained using the original dataset (black circles) and the dataset with the changes in ROI included (red crosses) are plotted to the same scale for comparison.
